Text: The File itself is roughly 9Gig so the extraction will take a while depending on your PC specs. Tested on my PC it took about 13min tops so be patient and let it extract.

Please note: The extraction will output all the necessary files to the directory of your choosing. Most common directory is C: Program Files. 
This is not an ISO or image file, it is simply the files from a full install compressed using winrar.
Once extracted run the SWTFU2 .exe in the folder to play the game.

If you are experiencing any problems with the game then check out the link below.

http://www.gamebrood.com/2010/10/28/star-wars-the-force-unleashed-2-pc-fix-and-fixes-for-crashes-errors-black-screen-issues-freezes-graphics-glitch-level-bug-controls-not-responding-no-sound-low-performance-choppy-and-stutteri/
Please seed. This torrent desperately needs seeders.
@Spanktastic2120, Leechers are @ 93% right now. They will become seeders @ 100 % !
So does this work with cutscenes in english or what?

@treyjedi, this is the full game in english and yes it works. Nothing has been touched, it is all the files from the full install. 
I have tested this on 3 separate PC's using XP SP3, VISTA and WIN 7 and it works great.
Just make sure your PC is up to date with the latest drivers etc, as there has been known issues with the game itself.

Minimum specs
- Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 5200+
- Memory: 2 GB RAM
- Video: 256 MB Video Memory with Shader 3.0 support - ATI Radeon HD 2600 / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT
- Hard disk space: 10GB + 1GB Swapfile
- Operating system: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP2, or Windows 7
- Sound: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible Audio Device
- DirectX: DirectX 9.0c (March 2009) 

Recommended specs
- Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 6000+
- Video: 256 MB Video Memory with Shader 3.0 support - ATI Radeon HD 4800 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260
Download was quick and unpacking took less than 20 min like Coolguy33 says.  Opened without trouble, all cutscenes in English no glitches as of yet.  Played 3 hours so far without any problems!
Many thanks mate. It saves us big time and pain not having to install and crack and so uninstall.

i made it to the end and chose the dark side, at which point the screen went black and only the audio for the cutscene played. had to go to youtube to see the ending. everything else worked fine though.

@FeniXrisen, you must disable Vertical Sync (Vsync) in either your Nvidia Control Panel or ATI Catalyst Control Center. It is a known bug in the game that when Vsync is enabled it causes stuttering in the cut scenes.

@mtracker, make sure you have the latest DirectX End-User Runtime.
